name: Doki Doki Our Final Heartbeat
storyline: This mod provides a different ending for the game. This ending will be available after you have collected all the CGs in the game. Only then will the mod begin in earnest. This mod was made with all our love and affection for the game, and as a thank you for the experience it gave me.
summary: Doki Doki: Our Final Heartbeat is a mod for Doki Doki Literature Club that takes players on an intense and dark emotional journey. Unlike the original experience, this mod delves even deeper into the characters' inner conflicts, exploring themes such as loss, sacrifice and redemption.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: DDLC Our Final Heartbeat Part 1: Saving Sayori
